definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
erhua variant of 大氣|大气[da4 qi4]

pinyin: da4 qi4 ceng2 he2 shi4 yan4

sentences.english: The air is rather unstable near the moisture frontal zone.
sentences.chinese: 同时有很强的湿度锋区，大气处于不稳定状态。

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。

sentences.english: Moisture in the atmosphere condensed into dew during the night.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的水分在夜间凝结成露珠。

sentences.english: Black carbon absorbs solar radiation, warming the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 炭黑吸收阳光辐射，让大气增温。

sentences.english: The atmosphere is indeed getting tensed.
A new instrument for measuring the total precipitable water in the atmosphere is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种测量大气水汽总量的新方法和仪器。

sentences.english: Lastly, we assume a standard atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们承担一个标准大气。

sentences.english: Contributing to the funereal atmosphere is an enforced nocturnal darkness.
sentences.chinese: 对送葬的大气有助益是被运行的夜黑暗。

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.
sentences.chinese: 印章构型稳固，古朴敦厚，大气浑然，至尊无上。

sentences.english: This is sunlight refracted through our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些是从地球大气层中折射出的光线。

sentences.english: Gas regulation is by both carbon sequestration and oxygen supply.
sentences.chinese: 大气调节包括碳固定和氧气释放。

sentences.english: This book is about water , air and soil pollution.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本介绍水体，大气和土壤污染的书籍。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 当水汽凝成雨水，会造成局域性的大气压力下降。

sentences.english: You can tell he is a parvenu.
sentences.chinese: 你看他财大气粗，就知道他是个暴发户。

sentences.english: Europe has some of the most stringent air-pollution limits in the world.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有一些世界上最严格的大气污染限制标准。

sentences.english: The method was successfully applied to the quantitative analysis of carbonyl compounds in ambient air samples.
sentences.chinese: 该方法成功地应用到对大气中羰基化合物的定量检测。

definition: expert/scholar/mother earth/a type of green tea
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
